verses.verse: Deliver <S%H2502><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, from the evil <S%H7451><s%> man. <S%H120><s%> Preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from the violent <S%H2555><s%> man; <S%H376><s%>
those who devise <S%H2803><s%> mischief <S%H7451><s%> in their hearts. <S%H3820><s%> They continually <S%H3117><s%> gather themselves together <S%H1481><s%> for war. <S%H4421><s%>
They have sharpened <S%H8150><s%> their tongues <S%H3956><s%> like a serpent. <S%H5175><s%> Viper <S%H5919><s%>'s poison <S%H2534><s%> is under their lips. <S%H8193><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> me from the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%> Preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from the violent <S%H2555><s%> men <S%H376><s%> who have determined <S%H2803><s%> to trip <S%H1760><s%> my feet. <S%H6471><s%>

The proud <S%H1343><s%> have hidden <S%H2934><s%> a snare <S%H6341><s%> for me, <S%H6566><s%> they have spread the cords <S%H2256><s%> of a net <S%H7568><s%> by the path. <S%H3027><s%> They have set <S%H7896><s%> traps <S%H4170><s%> for me. <S%H5542><s%> Selah.
I said <S%H559><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "You are my God. <S%H410><s%>" Listen <S%H238><s%> to the cry <S%H6963><s%> of my petitions, <S%H8469><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> the Lord, <S%H136><s%> the strength <S%H5797><s%> of my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> you have covered <S%H5526><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle. <S%H5402><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> don't <S%H5414><s%> grant the desires <S%H3970><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%> Don't <S%H7563><s%> let their evil plans <S%H2162><s%> succeed, <S%H7311><s%> or they will become proud. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
As for the head <S%H7218><s%> of those who surround <S%H4524><s%> me, <S%H5999><s%> let the mischief of their own lips <S%H8193><s%> cover them. <S%H3680><s%>
Let burning coals <S%H1513><s%> fall <S%H4131><s%> on them. <S%H5307><s%> Let them be thrown into the fire, <S%H784><s%> into miry pits, <S%H4113><s%> from where they never rise. <S%H6965><s%>

An evil speaker <S%H376><s%> won't <S%H3559><s%> be established in the earth. <S%H776><s%> Evil <S%H7451><s%> will hunt <S%H6679><s%> the violent <S%H2555><s%> man <S%H376><s%> to overthrow him. <S%H4073><s%>
I know <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will maintain <S%H6213><s%> the cause <S%H1779><s%> of the afflicted, <S%H6041><s%> and justice <S%H4941><s%> for the needy. <S%H34><s%>
Surely the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to your name. <S%H8034><s%> The upright <S%H3477><s%> will dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your presence. <S%H6440><s%>
